body:
Task backlog metrics in matching service persist incorrectly after task queue partitions move between pods. 
The matching service should reset gauge metrics to zero when queues are unloaded during rebalancing.

(This issue is already tracked internally, created here for visibility)

comments.body:
closed by https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/pull/8375 - note: to replicate this exact issue locally proved to be challenging under a time constraint, so we are actively monitoring if it does happen again in production 

having said that, we are confident in saying that the above fix should work

title: Clear backlog size metric when unload task queue from matching
